texts.en: This is a project made in C++ with OpenGL. The goal is to create a small scene that mimics the Minecraft world.
texts.zh: 这是一个C++和OpenGL项目，目标是实现模仿Minecraft世界的画面。

texts.en:
Main Features
- Terrain Generation
- Blinn-Phong lighting model
- Shadow Mapping
- Simple wave simulation
- Player Movement
- Player Collision
- Controllable Sunlight Angle
- Controllable Orbiting Camera

Used libraries
GLFW, Glad, glm, stb.

Source code & more info at:
texts.zh:
主要特性
- 地形生成
- Blinn-Phong 光照
- 阴影贴图
- 简单的波浪模拟
- 玩家移动
- 玩家碰撞
- 可控日照角度
- 可控环绕相机

使用库
GLFW, Glad, glm, stb.
